title: Triangular arbitrage
description: To execute arbitrage trades on three markets of the same exchange when price discrepancy among those markets are found
author: supervik

title: PMM with adjusted mid pice
description: This is an example of a pure market making strategy with an adjusted mid price based on slippage
author: cmichaeltimmons

title: Simple RSI
description: This script aims to buy when RSI is below 30 and sell when above 70
author: shibanovp

title: Volume Pumpr
description: This script aims to maximize trading volume without losing (too much) money, prioritizing high volume, and low risk over profitability.
author: keo

title: Trailing Geometric Grid
description: This script execute a trailing grid strategy with geometric price that increment & decrement.
author: talkinandy

title: 1/N Index Portfolio
description: This strategy aims to create a 1/N cryptocurrency portfolio, providing perfect diversification without parametrization and giving a reasonable baseline performance.
author: rolandkofler
